#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int N,num1,num2,n1,n2,sum,sumf,digit;
	cin>>N;
	while(N--)
	{
		n1=0;
		n2=0;
		sumf=0;
		cin>>num1>>num2;
		while(num1>0)
		{
			digit=num1%10;
			num1=num1/10;
			n1=n1*10+digit;
		}
		while(num2>0)
		{
			digit=num2%10;
			num2=num2/10;
			n2=n2*10+digit;
		}
		sum=n1+n2;
		while(sum>0)
		{
			digit=sum%10;
			sum=sum/10;
			sumf=sumf*10+digit;
		}
		cout<<sumf<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
